lines.speaker: Player
lines.text: Who are you, bring forth your lord at once.

lines.speaker: Lieutenant
lines.text: I take no orders from the likes of you.

lines.speaker: Player
lines.text: So you're just one of his dogs.

lines.speaker: Player
lines.text: Why did you burn my village? We had nothing to do with your wars...

lines.speaker: Player
lines.text: Why did you kill my... friend

lines.speaker: Lieutenant
lines.text: To think our prize would walk right into our hands.

lines.speaker: Lieutenant
lines.text: Prepare yourself, peasant. My lord wouldn't like it if I killed you.

lines.speaker: Lieutenant
lines.text: But you won't be needing all those limbs.
